body.p:
Hon Thos. E. Bramlette
Govenor of Kentucky

We the undersigned would respectfully state, that at the October Term of the Jeff Circuit Cout, Mary Holmes f. w. c, & Sarah Robinson f w c, were convicted upon a charge of Grand Larceny for one year. They have already served more than half the term. We think from the circumstances of the case that Executive Clemency would be rightfully bestowed if they were Pardoned. We therfor respectfully ask your Excellency to grant each one of the parties named a pardon & we will ever pray &c

W. A. Ronald) Sheriff
Dear Governor
I do hope you will pardon Mary Holmes and Sarah Robinson. I regret that I ever allowed them to be sent to the penitentiary.
and I regret that I prosecuted them

Jefferson Cir Ct
vs
Mary Holmes & Sarah Robinson
f W C.
Pardon
